description: one sheet with two drawings of a house with trees separated by a crease in the middle of the sheet; the house on the left has a fence around it with hills and trees in the background and one large tree to the right of the house; the house on the right has a path leading from the door and one large tree in front of it with multiple rows of trees behind it
inscription: LLC in red pencil, on verso: 134i  | BC in red pencil, on verso: 134h | LRC in pencil, on verso: 1424
title: Landscape with House
